title: Revita - Soundtrack
description: Revita's original soundtrack has a strong focus on melancholy. A culmination of somber piano lines, emotional cello and guitar performances, and all sorts of digital drumkits and synthesizers, as well as intriguing melodies keep the players incited.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Revita Soundtrack
<!--text-->
Revita's original soundtrack has a strong focus on melancholy. A culmination of somber piano lines, emotional cello and guitar performances, and all sorts of digital drumkits and synthesizers, as well as intriguing melodies keep the players incited.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# And more....
<!--text-->
"In his collaboration with Benjamin ""BenStar"" Kiefer, Christoph Jakob was brought to the table to craft the musical accompaniment to Revita.

Drawing inspiration from Hollow Knight and the Donkey Kong Country series, Revita's original soundtrack has a strong focus on melancholy. A culmination of somber piano lines, emotional cello and guitar performances, and all sorts of digital drumkits and synthesizers, as well as intriguing melodies keep the players incited.
The album contains 57 tracks delivered in high quality MP3 (320 kpbs) and lossless WAV. It has a total length of 2 hrs and 40 min.
